snippet: World premiere plays by Doug Wright, Rajiv Joseph and Halley Feiffer, as well as a pair of David Mamet revivals, are the highlights of the Atlantic Theater Company's upcoming season....

headline.print_headline: Wright, Joseph, Feiffer Plays Set for Atlantic Co.
headline.main: Wright, Joseph, Feiffer Plays Set for Atlantic Co.

lead_paragraph: World premiere plays by Doug Wright, Rajiv Joseph and Halley Feiffer, as well as a pair of David Mamet revivals, are the highlights of the Atlantic Theater Company's upcoming season.
